he  low-pressure  area  in  the  Southwest  Bay  of  Bengal  is  moving  further  away  from  the  Sri
Lanka.

W
eather Forecast for tomorrow (20th of December):

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in
Galle and Matara districts.

S
everal spells of showers will occur in North-western province.

howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Uva, Central and Eastern provinces and
in Hambantota and Polonnaruwa districts during the evening or night. Fairly heavy showers above
50 mm are likely at some places in these areas.
Misty  conditions  can  be  expected  particularly  in  Northern,  North-Central,  Central  and  Eastern
provinces during the morning.
